card.name: Prismo, The Wishmaster
card.text: Prismo enters with a loyalty counter for each color of mana spent to cast him [+1]: Add one mana of any color. [-3]: Reveal a card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand.

card.name: Ice-O-Pede
card.text: Vigilance Madness {2}{U} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Ongoing Mystery
card.text: Whenever one or more creatures you control deal damage to a player, create a Clue token. {2}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a Clue token.

card.name: Raze the Roof
card.text: Destroy target artifact or land, then create a Music token. (It's a Music enchantment with "{1}, Sacrifice this enchantment: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.")

card.name: Deathly Reunion
card.text: You may exile target card from a graveyard. Create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token with flying. Flashback {1}{WB} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Comedic Slip
card.text: Return target creature an opponent controls to its owners hand. Morbid — If a creature died this turn, that creature's owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library instead.

card.name: GOLB, Entropy Manifest
card.text: Convoke, delve Flying, vigilance, trample, haste, indestructible If GOLB would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, instead exile it. You may cast GOLB from exile.

card.name: Out of Options
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block and has "At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice this creature."

card.name: Fire // Ice
card.text:
Fire deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.
---
Tap target permanent. Draw a card.

card.name: Donny, Beligerant Ogre // Obnoxygen Cloud
card.text:
Protection from Whywolves When Donny enters, it fights up to one target creature you don't control.
---
Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

prop.type: Legendary Creature — Plant Ogre // Sorcery — Adventure

card.name: Now // Then
card.text:
Create X Clue tokens. X can't be 0.
---
Affinity for relics Target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to it's mana cost.

card.name: Battle Preperations
card.text: Gear up (Create a colorless Equipment artifact token with "Equipped creature gets +1/+1." and Equip {2}.) Flashback {1}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Dad's Holomessage
card.text: Bundle 2 (When you draft this card, you get two additional copies.) When this artifact enters, surveil 2. {2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.

card.name: GOLB's Bauble
card.text: This artifact enters tapped. {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card and you get two rad counters. (At the beginning of your precombat main phase, if you have any rad counters, mill that many cards. For each nonland card milled this way, you lose 1 life and a rad counter.)

card.name: Mom's Holomessage
card.text: When this artifact enters, create a Food token. {2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.

card.name: Dr. Gross, Gene Splicer
card.text: Pay 2 life, Sacrifice another creature: Draw a card. {3}, Discard a card, Exile two creatures from your graveyard: Create a tapped token copy of one of the exiled cards except it has base power and toughness equal to the other exiled card.

card.name: Bridge Shades // Underside Ambush
card.text:
{B}: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
---
Until end of turn, you may cast spells as though they had flash.

card.name: Sizzling Slap
card.text: Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.) Sizzling Slap deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Romantic Rendezvous
card.text: Discard a card, then draw two cards.

card.name: Life // Death
card.text:
All lands you control become 1/1 creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.
---
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. You lose life equal to its mana value.

card.name: Malefic Tutor
card.text: Search your library for a nonland card with mana value less than the number of cards you own in exile, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Escape—{2}{B}, Exile three other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)

card.name: Tragic Slip
card.text: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Morbid — That creature gets -13/-13 until end turn instead if a creature died this turn.

card.name: Complex Equation
card.text: Draw two cards Mathematical! (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell you cast before it this turn.)

card.name: Stretch Around
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains hexproof and reach until end of turn.

card.name: Feral Pageling
card.text: When this creature enters, you may discard a card then draw a card. Unearth—Sacrifice a relic (Sacrifice a relic: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Olive, Service Droid
card.text: Flying When Olive Enters, you may search your library for a land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Secret Wizard Handshake
card.text: Create two 2/1 red Wizard creature tokens with prowess. Madness {2}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Bypass
card.text: Counter target instant or sorcery spell.

card.name: Thrumming Worm
card.text: Whenever you discard a nonland card, create a token copy of this creature.

card.name: Wizardlings
card.text: Whenever you discard a card for the first time each turn, this creature gains +2/+0 until end of turn. Madness {0} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Portent of Calamity
card.text: Reveal the top X cards of your library. For each card type, you may exile a card of that type from among them. Put the rest into your graveyard. You may cast a spell from among the exiled cards without paying its mana cost if you exiled four or more cards this way. Then put the rest of the exiled cards into your hand.

card.name: Spectral Drop-Baller
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then sacrifice it unless you pay {1} for each +1/+1 counter on it. When this creature leaves the battlefield, draw a card for each +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Bubblegum's Rockets
card.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add two mana of any one color. When this artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: CGO, Bootleg Bot
card.text: When CGO enters, mill four cards. Whenever CGO dies or another artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return to your hand target artifact card in your graveyard with lesser mana value.

card.name: Settle Beyond Reality
card.text: Choose one or both — • Exile target creature you don't control. • Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Thrumming Worm WIP
card.text: Whenever you discard a nonland card, create a token copy of this creature.

card.name: Olympus Mons
card.text: Your devotion to red is increased by one. {T}: Add {R}.

card.name: Downed
card.text: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying.

card.name: Cousin Chicle
card.text: Conniving — Whenever you discard a nonland card, Cousin Chicle can't be blocked until end of turn. Whenever Cousin Chicle attacks, each opponent loses X life and you gain X life, where X is the number of Candy creatures you control.
